title: Roast goose with chickpea and lemon stuffing
description: Goose really ought to rival turkey more as the Christmas bird of choice, if only for the quality of the resulting roast potaoes. A chickpea and sausage stuffing makes a perfect side dish.
ingredients: a little goose fat or oil
salt and freshly ground black pepper
6 Maris Piper potatoes, cut for roast potatoes
